DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Normal Adjacent Tissue Preservation Date/Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date and time that normal adjacent tissue specimens were preserved by fixation or freezing.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm._Next to or adjoining._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._The activity of protecting something from loss or danger; a process that saves organic substances from decay; to maintain or keep intact.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.:Next to or adjoining.:An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.:The activity of protecting something from loss or danger; a process that saves organic substances from decay; to maintain or keep intact.

Concepts.definition: Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.
An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.
The activity of protecting something from loss or danger; a process that saves organic substances from decay; to maintain or keep intact.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Concepts linked to Tissue Banking and Pathology activities

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Display format: MM/DD/YYYY HR:MN; Use NCIt based Rep Class
